summary: This document outlines the corporate resolutions for Max Hotel Services Corp. regarding the establishment of accounts with UBS Financial Services Inc. It details the authority granted to certain individuals within the corporation to manage these accounts and conduct various financial transactions on behalf of the corporation.

persons.name: Max Hotel Services Corp.
persons.context: The corporation is seeking to establish accounts with UBS Financial Services Inc. for various financial transactions.

persons.name: Secretary
persons.context: The Secretary is responsible for certifying the resolutions and the identities of the Authorized Persons.

persons.name: Assistant Secretary
persons.context: The Assistant Secretary is authorized to assist in certifying the resolutions and the identities of the Authorized Persons.

connections.description: The Secretary is an authorized representative of Max Hotel Services Corp. responsible for certifying corporate resolutions.
The Assistant Secretary is an authorized representative of Max Hotel Services Corp. assisting in corporate matters.

keyFacts: The document outlines the authorization for Max Hotel Services Corp. to establish accounts with UBS Financial Services Inc.
It specifies the powers granted to Authorized Persons to manage the accounts without needing co-signatures.
The Secretary and Assistant Secretary are responsible for certifying the resolutions and the identities of the Authorized Persons.
